title: Geomicrobiology
description: Interactions between microorganisms and the geosphere; microbial energetics and genetics; geochemical controls on microbial diversity and activity; redox and acid-base balances; biogeochemical cycles; evolution. Crosslisted with BIOL 6765.

prerequisites: EAS 3620 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
